details.title: Non-coherent radar CFAR detection based on goodness-of-fit tests

authors.affiliation: Dept. of Electr. Eng., Sharif Univ. of Technol., Tehran
authors.name: Y. Norouzi

details.abstract: This paper considers the problem of constant false alarm rate (CFAR) detection of radar targets using multiple observations. In the Gaussian clutter scenario, the structure of the optimum (uniformly most powerful) CFAR detector is rather simple, but when the clutter is heavy-tailed, that is non-Gaussian distributed, the derivation of the optimal detector becomes infeasible. For this latter relevant case, a new CFAR algorithm is porposed based on goodness-of-fit (GoF) tests. The performance of the proposed detector is numerically investigated through Monte Carlo simulations assuming heavy-tailed Weibull and Lognormal distributed clutter. Numerical results shown that, in heavy-tailed clutter and also when several interfering targets exist, the proposed detector outperforms the conventional CFAR detector based on binary integration. Performance is also tested processing real sea clutter data collected by a non-coherent navigation radar

ieee.title: Statistical modeling of noncoherent S-band marine radar clutter data and automatic threshold detection
ieee.displayText: Süleyman Baykut, Abdullah H. Özcan, İlhan K. Yalçın, "Statistical modeling of noncoherent S-band marine radar clutter data and automatic threshold detection", Signal Processing and Communications Applications Conference (SIU) 2012 20th, pp. 1-4, 2012.

ieee.title: Performance Analysis of Non Coherent CFAR Detection Based on Goodness-of-Fit Tests in Different Clutter Environments
ieee.displayText: Bin Liu, Lingjiang Kong, Jianyu Yang, Shigong Jia, "Performance Analysis of Non Coherent CFAR Detection Based on Goodness-of-Fit Tests in Different Clutter Environments", Image and Signal Processing 2009. CISP '09. 2nd International Congress on, pp. 1-4, 2009.

ieee.title: Intelligent and fast two-dimensional CFAR procedure
ieee.displayText: Junwei Yan, Xiang Li, Zhenhai Shao, "Intelligent and fast two-dimensional CFAR procedure", Communication Problem-Solving (ICCP) 2015 IEEE International Conference on, pp. 461-463, 2015.

ieee.title: Fast Two-Dimensional CFAR Procedure
ieee.displayText: Matthias Kronauge, Hermann Rohling, "Fast Two-Dimensional CFAR Procedure", Aerospace and Electronic Systems IEEE Transactions on, vol. 49, pp. 1817-1823, 2013, ISSN 0018-9251.

ieee.title: Extensive Monte Carlo simulations for performance comparison of three non-coherent integrations using Log-t-CFAR detection against Weibull clutter
ieee.displayText: Nedjma Detouche, Toufik Laroussi, "Extensive Monte Carlo simulations for performance comparison of three non-coherent integrations using Log-t-CFAR detection against Weibull clutter", Sciences of Electronics Technologies of Information and Telecommunications (SETIT) 2012 6th International Conference on, pp. 726-729, 2012.

ieee.title: A Computationally Efficient CFAR Algorithm Based on a Goodness-of-Fit Test for Piecewise Homogeneous Environments
ieee.displayText: Jeong Hun Kim, Mark R. Bell, "A Computationally Efficient CFAR Algorithm Based on a Goodness-of-Fit Test for Piecewise Homogeneous Environments", Aerospace and Electronic Systems IEEE Transactions on, vol. 49, pp. 1519-1535, 2013, ISSN 0018-9251.

ieee.title: Adaptive CFAR detection in heterogeneous Compound-Gaussian
ieee.displayText: Xinyi Peng, Lingjiang Kong, Tianxian Zhang, Xuanbo Fang, Zhenxing Chen, "Adaptive CFAR detection in heterogeneous Compound-Gaussian", Radar Conference (RADAR) 2013 IEEE, pp. 1-4, 2013, ISSN 1097-5659.

ieee.title: Range-spread target detector based on AD test for non-Gaussian Clutter
ieee.displayText: X. F. Gu, Y. He, T. Jian, C. A. Xu, X. L. Hao, "Range-spread target detector based on AD test for non-Gaussian Clutter", Radar (Radar) 2011 IEEE CIE International Conference on, vol. 2, pp. 1696-1699, 2011.

ieee.title: Empirical Distribution-Based Event Detection in Wireless Sensor Networks: An Approach Based on Evidence Theory
ieee.displayText: Nhan Nguyen-Thanh, Insoo Koo, "Empirical Distribution-Based Event Detection in Wireless Sensor Networks: An Approach Based on Evidence Theory", Sensors Journal IEEE, vol. 12, pp. 2222-2228, 2012, ISSN 1530-437X.

ieee.title: MLE-based order statistic automatic CFCAR detection in Weibull background
ieee.displayText: Souad Chabbi, Toufik Laroussi, Mourad Barkat, "MLE-based order statistic automatic CFCAR detection in Weibull background", Advances in Computational Tools for Engineering Applications 2009. ACTEA '09. International Conference on, pp. 541-546, 2009.
